name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the luxury brand Fendi cooperated with Korean craftsmen to launch a co-branded bag. Because its design used a weaving technique similar to the Chinese knot, the official account called it Korean craftsmanship in the promotion. This triggered boycotts and dissatisfaction among Chinese netizens. 
Netizens accused "South Korea again... again... stealing our culture" and "Are there not enough major brands copying Chinese elements?" 
Fendi responded: At present, the feedback has been reported to the relevant departments for verification and processing. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkzlID7aoAAb7kP.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 25, Kunshan, Jiangsu. A woman said that she was dissatisfied after being reported for illegal construction, so she reported other people's illegal construction to the relevant departments, but was pushed and insulted by the staff: "If he tells you to eat shit, will you eat shit? Stupid x"
Another staff member said that you should be scolded, you have no right to report others, and if I say you have no rights, then you have no rights. (The mosaics in the video are added by netizens) https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895142780650815488/pu/img/XEcN7YywxlM66JeJ.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 26, Shandong Urban Investment Company’s financial products collapsed and could not be redeemed. Investors knelt down to the leaders to defend their rights, and the entire company hall was filled with wailing. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895151765290381312/pu/img/7trAOIBSnjkmpHmB.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 25, Jinan, Shandong. Building 4 of Yuanda Shopping Plaza Center was left unfinished, and the owners were forced to move into the cold unfinished building. The developer not only installed signal blockers to prevent the owners from speaking out live, but also said to the owners, "We Yuanda is just messing around, what can you do about it?" 
One owner said, "The economy is not good now, the factory doesn't pay wages, I have two children, and the house is unfinished again, what do you think I should do?" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895150778647556096/pu/img/cWAdxzSuFRfmYpGS.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 25, Tianjin. A one-legged man works two jobs a day. He gets up at 4 a.m. to work at a breakfast shop, and delivers food in the afternoon. He said, "There are many people at home who need me, so I can't stop." https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895157739564998657/pu/img/YSV0EkV7odsiqLVA.jpg
